mapper.insert: insert into muinMember(id, pw, name, birth, address, phone, registerdate) values (#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{birth}, #{address}, #{phone}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select count(*) from muinMember where id = #{id}
mapper.update: update muinMember set pw=#{pw}, name=#{name}, birth=#{birth}, address=#{address}, phone=#{phone}, registerdate=sysdate where id=#{id}
